metadata.title: CVE-2019-9720 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow in the subtitle decoder in Libav 12.3 allowsattackers to corrupt the stack via a crafted video file in Matroska format,because srt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c misuses snprintf.

criterions.comment: vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
